submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, col: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n=len(col)
        a=col+col
        res=0
        l=r=0
        cnt=0
        while l<n:
            while r-l+1<k:
                r+=1
                if a[r]==a[r-1]:
                    cnt+=1
            if cnt==0:
                res+=1
            if a[l]==a[l+1]:
                cnt-=1
            l+=1
        return res
